comments.body: service_name_or_id, interface, and region should also be passed here since that is all updateable

not quite.

This module does not accept the endpoint id, it takes service_name_or_id, interface and region to find the endpoint. If the user specifies another name_or_id, interface or region then a matching endpoint will not be found and a new one will be created.
ah i see your point. yea that makes sense. well this looks good to me then. thanks for the changes!
